title: Memory efficient scrolling
description: Some libraries allocate more items in memory to achieve good performance. FlashList does not recreate items as a user scrolls, making it noticeably more memory efficient.

title: Developer friendly
description: Using FlatList's API makes FlashList a really easy-to-use component. Simply change the name of your component and you are good to go.

title: Snappy on all platforms
description: Other lists show good-enough performance on iOS, but where they lack performance is on Android devices. FlashList performs well even on low-end Android devices.

title: Extra configuration for even better performance.
description: Apart from FlatList props, FlashList offers a set of extra props to tweak the performance even more.Apart from FlatList props, FlashList offers a set of extra props to even tweak the performance even more.
